organizations: George D. Widener Hospital for Large Animals
lead_paragraph: Doctors planned to change the cast on Barbaro’s right hind leg yesterday, a hospital spokeswoman said. Barbaro, the Kentucky Derby winner who broke three bones in his right rear ankle at the start of the Preakness Stakes in May, is recovering at the George D. Widener Hospital for Large Animals in Kennett Square, Pa. The new cast will give doctors a chance to evaluate the progress of the fracture.
